content: वंश्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वंशे भवः यत्] {@--1@} Relating to the main beam. {@--2@} Connected with the spine. {@--3@} Belonging to a family. {@--4@} Of a good family, born in a good family. {@--5@} Lineal, genealogical. --श्यः {@--1@} A descendant, posterity (<ab>pl.</ab>); इतरेऽपि रघोर्वंश्याः <ls>R. 15. 35.</ls> {@--2@} A forefather, an ancestor; नूनं मत्तः परं वंश्याः पिंडविच्छेददर्शिनः <ls>R. 1. 66.</ls> {@--3@} Any member of a family. {@--4@} A cross-beam. {@--5@} A bone in the arm or leg. {@--6@} A pupil. {@--7@} A kinsman from seven generations above and seven below.
